description:
A later version of the classic and original one-piece BIC razor for men, the BIC 2 Sensitive twin-blade razor has stainless steel blades coated in chrome and polymer for durability. The blades are specially angled so you can expect a comfortable smoother shave than a BIC single-blade razor and great value for money. The slim fixed head is designed for precision. The handle is also designed for accurate handling and a no-nonsense shaving experience. Quickly and efficiently tame that stubble with this lightweight men?s razor that?s also easily portable for whenever you need a shave. BIC has over 40 years of experience in designing and manufacturing razors, so this is expertise you can count on. Every blade is made in Europe at BIC?s own state-of-the-art plants where each razor undergoes stringent quality controls. Legendary BIC quality and value.

- The twin-blade BIC 2 Sensitive disposable razor for men has stainless steel blades for a close and comfortable shave
- The slim fixed head is engineered to more easily tackle hard-to-reach areas for a clean shave
- A twin-blade razor that?s quick and efficient with stainless steel blades coated in polymer and chrome for durability
- The long green handle is designed for accurate handling and control
- Delivers a smoother shave than the single-blade BIC 1 disposable razor for men
name: Bic Razor Disposable Twin Easy Sensitive 10 Pack
